LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_ChildHuntress.label: Psychic Power Pill (Hunter)
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_ChildHuntress.descri: A pill for children that blooms psychic powers. Has no effect on Miho already owning psychic powers. "It's very bitter, so give me chocolate later."
